languages.text: "На землю! Лежать, чернь! Руки покажи! Как посмел, погань!"
"On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"
languages.original_text: "На землю! Лежать, чернь! Руки покажи! Как посмел, погань!"

traits.locale_text: "On the ground! Stay down, lowlife! Show me your hands! How dare you, you filth!"
"On the ground! Stay down, lowlife! Show me your hands! How dare you, you filth!"
"On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"
"On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"
"On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"
"On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

languages.text: «¡Al suelo, ya! ¡Y no te levantes, escoria! ¡Manos arriba! ¡¿Cómo te atreves, rata inmunda?!».
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Al suelo, ya! ¡Y no te levantes, escoria! ¡Manos arriba! ¡¿Cómo te atreves, rata inmunda?!».

languages.text: 「さあ、地面に伏せろ！そのままでいろよ、このゲス！手を上げろ！恥知らずめが、よくもそんなことを！」
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、地面に伏せろ！そのままでいろよ、このゲス！手を上げろ！恥知らずめが、よくもそんなことを！」

languages.text: “趴在地上！快点！不准动，杂碎！把手举起来！好大的胆子，你这下贱的狗东西！”
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

traits.locale_text: “趴在地上！快点！不准动，杂碎！把手举起来！好大的胆子，你这下贱的狗东西！”

languages.text: "Auf den Boden, sofort! Und bleibt liegen, Taugenichts! Hände hoch! Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, Dreckszeug!"
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

traits.locale_text: "Auf den Boden, sofort! Und bleibt liegen, Taugenichts! Hände hoch! Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, Dreckszeug!"

languages.text: « À terre ! Et restes-y, vermine ! Les mains en l'air ! Comment oses-tu, espère d'ordure ?! »
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"

traits.locale_text: « À terre ! Et restes-y, vermine ! Les mains en l'air ! Comment oses-tu, espère d'ordure ?! »

languages.text: "Yat yere yat! Hemen! Öyle kal serseri! Eller yukarı! Bu ne cüret seni pislik!"
languages.original_text: "On the ground, now! And stay down, lowlife! Hands up! How dare you, you filth!"
